EmailTemplate.subject: {!Account.Name}: Your booking with Safari365
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
I have just chatted with {!Account.OwnerFirstName} regarding your booking and I thank you for considering us thus far. I realise that travelling to Africa represents a large investment in time and money, and doing your correct due diligence on your travel provider is important.
By way of a little history, we having been operating since 2005 and have systematically grown our knowledge to offer the best of Southern and East African tourism (primarily through the websites www.southafrica365.com and www.safari365.com ) We have had many thousand international clients travel with us - should you like a personal reference please let me know (I will try and find a previous client in your vicinity.)
We are long-standing members of the Southern Africa Tourism Services Association (SATSA www.satsa.com) which is the official body regulating all South African based tour operators. We also subscribe to SATSAâ€™s bonding scheme, that ensures should the member become financially insolvent prior to rendering the contracted service, the bond, (which has an indemnity limit of ZAR1.5 million), guarantees that deposits will be refunded, or the service replaced, to a maximum level of R300 000 per event or R75 000 per claim against the insolvent member.
SATSA Member Details:
South Africa 365 Travel cc Chapter Member - Tour Broker SATSA member no. 1649
We are further insured for Professional Indemnity with Safari and Tourism Insurance Brokers (SATIB, www.satib.co.za) who are specialists for the African travel market.
SATIB Policy Details:
South Africa 365 Travel cc Policy number 0600928-PI07/2007/0251 Professional Indemnity cover to a maximum value of R2 million
Please also have a look for our name on Tripadvisor (I realize there are currently limited reviews but this is something we are now encouraging our clients to contribute). We also have a growing Facebook following and I am sure if you post something on there you will get a accurate response.
Please let me know if you have any other concerns and I will endeavor to put them to rest.
Kind regards,
{!User.Name} {!User.Title} {!User.Email}
